Recruit for Clinical Interview Session

Recruitment flyers and example posts are in /PCX_Round2/Procedures/Recruitment Flyers

Participants get do SCID, refresher SCID or no SCID based on this flow chart:

Phone script for interested participants

Phone Script for Recruitment / Clinical Session

Clinical Interview Session

Here is a master script for the entire session:

Script for Clinical Interview Session

  1. Do consent forms (Holmes 01 Consent (CCNP Consent) & PCR_Consent)
  2. Ask any additional questions from Clinical Interview Questions (Optional) if you feel like

Here is a visual overview:

QUICK LINKS

MRI Session Scheduling

  1. Check the file in /Box/(Restricted)_PCR/PCR_Shared_with_CCNP/PCR_Linking_ID_CCNP.xlsx for any new participants
  2. Copy over new participants to /Box/(Restricted)_PCR/PCR_Holmes/PCR_Linking_ID_Holmes.xlsx
  3. For new participants, create a subject log for them in /Box/PCX_Round2/subject_logs by making a copy of the file in /templates/template.xlsx and renaming it sub-PCRID.xlsx from the linking sheet

  4. Look in iLabs for 3-5 upcoming MRI slots available on different days

    Donâ€™t know how? Read Tutorial: Booking MRI in iLabs

  5. ðŸ“ŸÂ Email the participant, filling in this template: MRI_Scheduling_Email
  6. ðŸ“ŸÂ Log responses + scheduled time
  7. ðŸ“ŸÂ If the participant needs an uber, check how much time it will take to get from the participantâ€™s pickup/dropoff locations and reserve the pickup Lyft for the date/time which will allow the participant to get there in time

  8. Schedule the reminder emails for 2-days out (and 5-days out if the scan is far in advance)

    Appointment_Reminder_2days

    Appointment_Reminder_5days

  9. Set a reminder for yourself to text the participant 36hrs before the scan time if they havenâ€™t confirmed after the 2days-before email

  10. 24hrs before MRI Session:

    If the participant hasnâ€™t confirmed, cancel the slot. If the participant confirms day-of, you can always rebook the slot as it will rarely be booked after you cancel. But if the participant doesnâ€™t show, you will still have to pay for the scan

    Tutorial: Cancelling MRI Scans in iLabs

MRI Session + Supplemental Battery

Session Day:

  1. ðŸ“ŸÂ Open up subject log for that participant and log the fields during the study
  2. Follow the script for this session

Scanning Session Script Rutgers

  1. EMAIL the task files to yourself from the scanning computer

  2. Add up the additional payments for the subject, including gas costs, parking/tolls costs, uber/lyft costs and overtime costs, and do the calculations in the subject log sheet for how much the subject is owed. Then put in an order to PerfectGift for that amount, rounding to the nearest dollar.

    Tutorial: Purchase gift cards from PerfectGift

1 Day Post-Session:

  1. Check if yesterdayâ€™s subject has filled out the supplemental survey, if not, send them Supplemental Survey Reminder Email
  2. Follow Tutorial: MRI to BIDS in Flywheel to convert the subjectâ€™s data to BIDS
  3. Follow Tutorial: BIDS to fMRIPrep in Flywheel to run the subject through fMRIPrep

2 Days Post-Session:

  1. Once fMRIPrep has finished, follow this tutorial to move the data from Flywheel to Amarel

    Tutorial: fMRIPrep in Flywheel to Amarel

    Tutorial: BIDS in Flywheel to Amarel

Monthly Data Storage & Maintenance

Qualtrics â†’ Box

  • Monthly, download from Qualtrics to have the most updated data backed up outside of Qualtrics
  • Use this script: download_qualtrics.ipynb

RedCAP â†’ Amarel

  • TBD, pulling from Phoenix, Kaley waiting for permissions

MindLAMP â†’ Amarel

  • TBD, pulling from Phoenix, Kaley waiting for permissions
  • But it will be something like:
    1. Be on a computer at Rutgers so itâ€™s on Rutgers wifi
    2. VPN into Eris (MGB HPC)
    3. run scp /path/to/output/folder KJ110[@eristwo.partners.org](mailto:mgb_username@eristwo.partners.org):/path/to/files .

Psychopy files â†’ BIDS â†’ Box â†’ Amarel

  • Email files to yourself from the scanning computer
  • Upload them to box in /PCX_Round2/Procedures/fMRI_tasks//data
    • Saved as sub-PCRID_task-taskName_xxxxx.csv

Use this script to

  1. Convert files from psychopy outputs to BIDS events.tsv
  2. Send files from local/box machine to remote server (Amarel)

/PCX_Round2/Procedures/fMRI_tasks/create_bids_files.ipynb

MindLAMP Payments

  • Each month at the end of the month, add up the number of surveys each subject did, and use this payment matrix to assign the amount theyâ€™re owed

    ðŸ“ŸÂ  Track this in the PCR_Tracker.xlsx

  • Send participants who are in MindLAMP an email based on this template:

    Monthly MindLAMP Email Template
